articles.title: Post Office system still causing unexplained shortfalls for over half of subpostmasters
articles.description: A quarter of today’s subpostmasters are ‘very dissatisfied’ with how the current Horizon IT system works
articles.content:
Over half of todays subpostmasters are experiencing unexplained accounting shortfalls on the controversial Horizon IT system used in branches.
